div.p: GENDEROFAUTHOR is an optional attribute modifying the element TINTERTEXTUALITY, conceptually part of WRITING TEXTUALFEATURES . Fill in the keyref attributes once glossentry topics for the specified elements exist (use the id attribute on the glossentry element.

div.codeblock: <TINTERTEXTUALITY INTERTEXTTYPE="parody" GENDEROFAUTHOR="male">Henrietta Battier chose a close parody of Dryden's Alexander's Feast.</TINTERTEXTUALITY>
<TINTERTEXTUALITY INTERTEXTTYPE="allusionAcknowledged" GENDEROFAUTHOR="female">Eliza Fenwick's novel reflects the influence of writing by Mary Wollstonecraft.</TINTERTEXTUALITY>

div.p: Judgement is involved in choosing between the tag PINFLUENCEDHER and TINTERTEXTUALITY with INTERTEXTTYPE value either AllusionAcknowledged or Imitation.
